  • Method Details

    • getBookshelfCellCoordinate

      protected Optional<Coordinate> getBookshelfCellCoordinate(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane bookshelfCell)
      Given a bookshelf cell that is a child of the graphical component representing the bookshelf view, it returns the coordinate that corresponds to that cell
      Parameters:
      bookshelfCell - the bookshelf cell whose position one wants to know
      Returns:
      the coordinates corresponding to the cell given if the cell given as parameter is inside the graphical component representing the bookshelf, an empty Optional otherwise.

    • getBookshelfCellAt

      protected Optional<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane> getBookshelfCellAt(Coordinate coordinate)
      Retrieves the bookshelf cell at the given coordinate
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate that has to contain a bookshelf cell
      Returns:
      the bookshelf cell if the coordinate given is in the real bookshelf, an empty Optional otherwise.

    • getBookshelfCellAt

      protected Optional<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane> getBookshelfCellAt(int row, int column)
      Retrieves the bookshelf cell at the given row and column
      Parameters:
      row - the row at which search the bookshelf cell
      column - the column at which search the bookshelf cell
      Returns:
      the bookshelf cell if the row and column index given is in the real bookshelf, an empty Optional otherwise.
